summary: Two NYC roomies have a pact to jump off Brooklyn Bridge, if they haven't found life partners before she's 30. That's less than a month away.
cast: Sarah Jessica Parker|Eric Schaeffer|Ben Stiller|Elle Macpherson|James Rebhorn|Robert John Burke|David Thornton|Bill Sage|Dominic Chianese|Scarlett Johansson|Michael Storms|Jason Myers|Emily Hart|Paul Greco|Mujibur Rahman|Sirajul Islam|Ben Lin|Alice Spivak|Lisa Gerstein|Molly Schulman|Peter Walker|Bradley Jenkel|Brian Keane|Alexander Blaise|Harrison Freed|Amanda Kravat
title: Si no te casas, me mato
